scenario: ABC LLC incurred the following expenses: Office Rent: $3,880.11, Political Contributions: $918.00, Traffic Fines: $7,799.47, Bribes: $9,880.54.
question: Calculate the total deductible trade or business expenses under I.R.C. § 162.
answer_explanation: Only ordinary and necessary business expenses are deductible. Total: $3,880.11.
